resources.string: An app to create, import, edit, share and easily execute shell scripts

Grarak: KernelAdiutor (code base)
topjohnwu: libsu & Magisk (on-boot service)
Lennoard Silva: Code contributions/pt-Br Translations
SmgKhOaRn: Korean translations
Oktapra Amtono: Indonesian translations
Mikesew1320: Amharic/Russian translations
tsiflimagas: Greek translations
Toxinpiper: App Icon
%s will be executed in late_start service!
Script name shouldn\'t be empty! Aborting.

Why this issue happened?

Your device is either not rooted, or the root permission is declined for Script Manager by you!


Why root permission needed?

In order to execute, or apply a script on boot, Script Manager needs superuser permissions, and is impossible on a device without root access!


How can I root my device?

A simple google search will help to find many guides to achieve root on your device. Please have a look at it!


Is rooting a device safe?

Rooting poses some security risk, but it's generally safe to do!
%s is excluded from the on boot service!
Permission denied for writing to storage!
A script named %s is already exists! Aborting.

To apply this script, simply download the file and import into Script Manager.
Script Manager %s can be obtained from
PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartpack.scriptmanager
GitHub: 
https://github.com/SmartPack/ScriptManager/raw/master/release/com.smartpack.scriptmanager.apk
Please select a file with %s extension.

Welcome to Script Manager: An app to create, import, edit, share and easily execute shell scripts.

*** WARNING> ***
This app is too powerful to mess up your device. The developer of this app won't take any responsibility, if something wrong happened to your device.
%s is not a proper script file! Aborting.
